title: Just pointing out how greedy the company riot you support is...
body:
Check out the latest video, the poro one. It has all the champions engaging in a "snowball " christmas type fight. Innocent right?

Till you realize the whole video is using subtle marketing by making sure every single damn champion in the video is sporting one of the new skins so you brainwashed plebs go and buy them.(also skins are more expensive now too..)

Stay frosty kids. Just watching your backs.
